title: Taonan city welcomes chili pepper season
text:
Famers in Taonan city, Northeast China's Jilin province are busy gathering and selecting chili peppers, forming a unique landscape in harvest season. [Photo by Yang Ailu/for chinadaily.com.cn]

Farmers in Taonan, Northeast China's Jilin province, celebrate a chili pepper harvest in late autumn.

Farmers are busy collecting and selecting their products. The piles of chili peppers form a unique landscape in harvest season.

Taonan, located in northwest of the province, has a long history growing the plant and sells most its produce to South Korea.
